Title: Relates to establishing the offense of aggravated rape and criminal sentencing for defendants convicted of certain sexual offenses
Summary: Establishes the offense of aggravated rape and provides criminal sentencing mandates for defendants convicted of certain sexual offenses.
LawCode: Add ยง130.36, amd ยง70.80, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the offense of aggravated rape and criminal sentencing for defendants convicted of certain sexual offenses
